solution_line_template: Each episode is {minutes_per_episode} minutes long, and there are {num_episodes} episodes, so the series takes {minutes_per_episode} minutes per episode * {num_episodes} episodes = <<{minutes_per_episode}*{num_episodes}={total_minutes_to_watch}>>{total_minutes_to_watch} minutes to watch.
{total_minutes_to_watch} minutes / {minutes_per_hour} minutes per hour = <<{total_minutes_to_watch}/{minutes_per_hour}={total_hours_to_watch}>>{total_hours_to_watch} hours to watch the series.

Tom can watch {hours_per_day_watching} hours of TV a day, so it will take him {total_hours_to_watch} hours / {hours_per_day_watching} hours per day = <<{total_hours_to_watch}/{hours_per_day_watching}={days_to_finish}>>{days_to_finish} days to watch the entire series.
